bill_title: Honoring the 2004 O'Gorman Knights Gymnastics Team and the students and staff involved in the program.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the 2004 O'Gorman Knights Gymnastics Team and the students and staff involved in the program. WHEREAS, the 2004 O'Gorman Knights Gymnastic Team won the South Dakota Class AA Girls Gymnastics Championship, by virtue of outstanding character, sportsmanship, perseverance, and dedication to excellence; and WHEREAS, the O'Gorman Knights Gymnastic Team received superior coaching and outstanding leadership guidance from head coach Lana Bauer and assistant coaches Shawn Bauer and Justin Olson; and WHEREAS, the members of the state champion O'Gorman Knights for 2004 include Tiffany Rolfing, Meg Bucy, Danielle Goetz, Lexi Gunderson, Alex Hughes, Mallory Peck, Ali Reiffenberger, and Sarah Weidler; and WHEREAS, teammate Alex Hughes was Individual All-Around Champion, with Danielle Goetz, Meg Bucy, and Mallory Peck also claiming individual titles: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-ninth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the O'Gorman Knights Gymnastics Team be commended for their excellence in athletics and academics for the 2003-2004 school year.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the 2004 O'Gorman Knights Gymnastics Team and the students and staff involved in the program. WHEREAS, the 2004 O'Gorman Knights Gymnastic Team won the South Dakota Class AA Girls Gymnastics Championship, by virtue of outstanding character, sportsmanship, perseverance, and dedication to excellence; and WHEREAS, the O'Gorman Knights Gymnastic Team received superior coaching and outstanding leadership guidance from head coach Lana Bauer and assistant coaches Shawn Bauer and Justin Olson; and WHEREAS, the members of the state champion O'Gorman Knights for 2004 include Tiffany Rolfing, Meg Bucy, Danielle Goetz, Lexi Gunderson, Alex Hughes, Mallory Peck, Ali Reiffenberger, and Sarah Weidler; and WHEREAS, teammate Alex Hughes was Individual All-Around Champion, with Danielle Goetz, Meg Bucy, and Mallory Peck also claiming individual titles: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-ninth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the O'Gorman Knights Gymnastics Team be commended for their excellence in athletics and academics for the 2003-2004 school year.
